name: GPU Cluster
description: K8S GPU cluster for deep learning and machine learning tasks.

name: Automatic Universal Tensile Machine
description: A fully automated tensile testing system covering the specimen handling, testing, and data analysis

name: 3D Measuring Machine
description: automatically measure the geometry of the specimen using robot and optics

name: Automatic Rolling Mill
description: automatic reverse 2-high rolling machine for plate

name: X-RAY Diffractometer
description: High-performance automated equipment capable of producing data at the scale needed for AI model training; it will be used to automate specimen preparation and build an AI service platform.

name: Fiber Laser Cutting Machine
description: A fiber laser-based system designed for the efficient cutting of complex geometries and high-speed test specimen preparation.
specifications: Processing Area (Working Area): 1.2 m x 0.9 m
